resources.string: For the first test, you will place your phone in your right pocket and stand upright with good posture for 20 seconds. Once you are ready, push the start button, place the phone in your pocket, stand upright with good posture, and wait for this phone to vibrate and ring until removing your phone from your pocket. Press the button below to begin the test.
Please put your phone in your right side pocket.

For the second test, you will place your phone in your pocket and perform a 30 second sit to stand chair test. Start seated, then stand up and sit down as many times as you can until the phone vibrates and rings. Then you may remove the phone from your pocket. Press the button below to begin the test.
Please put your phone in your right side pocket.
